Discovered repositories from the open source frontier

openvinotoolkit/openvino

Toolkit for optimizing and deploying deep learning models across CPUs, GPUs, and NPUs

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Generates images on CPUs using OpenVINO
  • DeepSpeed: library for scaling and optimizing deep learning training and inference
  • lightweight deep learning engine for mobile and edge devices
  • Runs AI models for audio processing locally on hardware
  • DeepEP — communication library for Mixture-of-Experts and expert parallelism, with all-to-all GPU kernels and low-precision support
  • minimal deep learning library that runs LLaMA and Stable Diffusion
  • PyTorch deep learning course files and code notebooks
  • Open source toolkit for training diffusion image models with a simple web or command line interface—supports latest models, requires high-end Nvidia GPU
  • DeepSeek-R1 GitHub repo with model code and info
  • Jupyter notebooks teaching deep learning with fastai and PyTorch
